Passive: They gain a shield based on their mana when dropping to low health.
Q: They fire their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.
W: They supercharge themselves to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
E: They charge up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air.
Ult: Enemies attacked by them are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, they can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.
